alert.note: Alert for Central Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 8:58PM AKST until December 14 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility and very cold wind chills. Additional snow accumulations one inch. North winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile at times. Wind chills to 55 below. * WHERE...In Passes of the Central Brooks Range. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. Wind chills to 55 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
